title: (x) Likewise logo sans serif w/ rounded "w" - House Chalet {Lex}
content:
Found this logo with a cute lowercase “w”... anybody know it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3597.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Fair Grounds" company logo on website - Monotype Script {BJ Harvey, Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050436/http:/typophile.com/node/40096 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Red Bull Creativity Contest website typography - FF Meta {Marc O, Rainer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050436/http:/typophile.com/node/40030 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dali137

comments.content: I should just look to House for my future Type ID needs, thanks guys.

It’s probably faster just to come here :-)

- Lex
